name: Hyperdrive
description:
Hyperdrive is an retro style arcade game for android set in space. The controls are simple but the game is difficult. The aim is to fly through as many hyper gates as possible, but every time you change direction the game speeds up until you lose control!

To move your ship upwards simply hold the screen. When you are not holding the screen the ship will move downwards.

Connecting the game with social media makes your friends scores show up in game, adding an additional competitive element to the game.

Have you got what it takes to master Hyperdrive?
